ComicInfo.Title: In the Grip of Infinity!
ComicInfo.Summary: In the Grip of Infinity!: Thor travels to the World Beyond to find out what happened to Odin. Meanwhile, Infinity and Odin battle while Infinity destroys chunks of the universe.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:15:38. [Issue ID 24052]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: The Silent One,The Guardian (Introduction),Infinity,Odin's Vizier,Heimdall,Don Blake,Loki (flashback),Odin,Cosgrove,Thor,Fandral,Volstagg],Dr. Brunner,Warriors Three [Hogun,Sif
